Children.Text: [H] Sklug's lvl 97+ Scrapyard QuestPack
If You Do NOT Wish to buy XP Potions, RIGHT CLICK and Disable the C# ScriptBelow

Children.CSharpCode:
// Player will not use XP potions if Disabled.
G["BuyExpPotionsOff"] = "false";

Children.Text: If You Wish to Skip Killing Rares, RIGHT CLICK and Disable the C# ScriptBelow

Children.CSharpCode:
// Player Will Skip Rare Mobs if Disabled
G["skipRares"] = "false";

Children.Text: Initializing Custom API

Children.CSharpCode:
// Initializing Instance and Injecting Custom API into Rebot
QH.API = this;

Children.Text: Identifying if Player Has Already Completed Every Quest Within This Profile
FlightPath Taxi Error Fix to Be Run Once at Start of Bot
Flightpath Check...
If Player is NOT in Draenor, We Will Nagivate There First (Also From Warspear)
If You Are in Draenor, but not in Spires of Arak or in the Garrison... returns you to the Garrison.
Due to Complications with the Mesh in T2/T3 Garrison, Navigating out of Town Hall if necessary...
If Player Is In the Garrison It Will Buy XP Potions. Ignores if Not in Garrison
Maneuvering Out of the Garrison to Continue
Taking Flight from the Garrison to Pinchwhistle Gearworks  to Avoid Mesh Errors
This is the XP Potion use Macro Thread - DELETE if you do not wish to use XP Potion
